articles.description: Sweet Potato Soul cookbook author Jenné Claiborne shared this delicious vegan and nut-free West African stew recipe that is great for a Kwanzaa celebration.

articles.author: Annalisa Pardo
articles.title: Local restaurant a target for vandalism, even on Christmas morning - KRQE News 13
articles.description: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (KRQE) – An Albuquerque family woke up on Christmas morning to vandalism at their restaurant. It’s the fourth time the restaurant has been hit since Halloween with the last incident just two weeks ago. The owners of Taste Of India said they …
